Text:
Thanks for the torrent! Some friends of mine wanted to watch this movie, and I had no idea how hard it would be to find.  It took 4 days or so to download, but it did finally work.  The quality is good, the split in the middle isn't too bad (and I can see how it might be nice to have CD sized files) and this really is the movie Never Been Kissed with Drew Barrymore.  I just wanted to make sure people know that this is the real deal.

-Minerva
